DIA_13689_Homeless_BatSoup_03_01: I made bat soup, but I can't eat all of it myself. Please have some!
DIA_13689_Homeless_BatSoup_15_02: Why are you giving me soup?
DIA_13689_Homeless_BatSoup_03_03: We need to be kind to each other - especially in difficult times.
DIA_13689_Homeless_BatSoup_03_04: Besides, what harm can bat soup do?
